languages.text: At the start of the Overseer's turn, the Mastiff lowers the power of Bleed, Burning, or Poison by {uip|Bonus|c15a6be91f594d72ab087a8522d39fae}.

languages.text: Si el cibermastín sufre el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}, al comienzo del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} el nivel de este efecto se reduce en −{uip|Bonus|c15a6be91f594d72ab087a8522d39fae}.
